amendment.description: Amendment sought to replace the bill's definition of "strategic and critical minerals" with the accepted definition from the National Research Council.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 114-301 to replace the bills definition of `strategic and critical minerals' with the accepted definition from the National Research Council.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 253 (Roll no. 560).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lowenthal amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 176 - 253 (Roll no. 560).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Lowenthal.
